response.overview: Q*bert's teacher tells a story about the history of Thanksgiving 350 years ago. In this fantasy story; Q*bert and his friends alongside Coily and his gang are potrayed as the Pilgrims sailing towards America and encounter Noser Indians who befriend them and will proudly teach them how to build homes and catch mini-fish. Coily and his gang antagonize Q*bert in attempt to win the award; a customized Q*horse and buggy.
response.title: Q*bert: Thanksgiving for the Memories
